bricklink.title: BrickLink Integration
bricklink.description: Get a complete parts list for any design. One click to order every brick you need.

1.a: Create mode lets you upload any photo and our AI transforms it into a buildable LEGO design. You get orthographic views to approve, full 3D step-by-step instructions, and a BrickLink parts list so you can order every piece.

2.q: What is the BrickLink parts list?
2.a: After your design is generated, we provide an itemized list of every LEGO piece needed. You can use this list to order parts directly from BrickLink or other brick marketplaces.

3.q: Does it work with non-LEGO brands?
3.a: Yes! Our AI can identify most standard brick types regardless of the brand.

4.q: Is the app free to use?
4.a: You can get started for free. Premium features like unlimited scans and advanced models are available with a subscription.

5.q: How does the design flow work?
5.a: Upload a photo, and AI generates orthographic LEGO views. Review and approve the views, then AI creates full 3D build instructions. You can regenerate views if you want a different interpretation.

6.q: Can I save my digital inventory?
6.a: Absolutely. Your brick collection is saved to your profile so you can build anytime.
